thread.title: Leapfrog launches Creatr HS Lite for simple 3D printing
thread.title_full: Leapfrog launches Creatr HS Lite for simple 3D printing

title: Leapfrog launches Creatr HS Lite for simple 3D printing
text:
Expand Creatr HS lite Leapfrog has launched a new simplified desktop 3D printer today featuring its largest build volume yet and high speed printing capabilities. 
The Creatr HS Lite is the latest product from the desktop 3D printer manufacturer and is a simplified version of its Creatr HS machine, designed to bring “reliable, simple and flawless” 3D printing to a bigger audience. 
The compact machine can go from preheat to printing in less than 10 minutes and comes equipped with a single extruder to ensure it is both easy to use and reliable. Compatible with only PLA, the Creatr HS Lite features a 13.6L build volume and is capable of producing objects up to 28cm in length at speeds of up to 300mm/s. 
This simplified 3D printer keeps manual interaction to a minimum with a 4inch full colour LCD screen, a single button and USB slot to transfer print files. The printer also comes with professional slicing software from Materialise. 
The Creatr HS Lite is priced at €1,699.00 (€2,055.79 Incl. VAT) and Leapfrog says they aim for machines to be delivered within a three-week window. Tags
